nodes.text: Mestral was a female Twi'lek dancer who performed in the cantina aboard Tansarii Point Station, where she and O'choa Detera danced to the music of Alisia, Alitra and Mako in 1 ABY.

Mestral was a non-hostile NPC in the MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies prior to its closure on December 15, 2011. She could be found in the tutorial level on Tansarii Point Station, which was added in the NGE update.
